answers.answer_text: Answers related to plant cuttings, asexual reproduction, xylem function, and selective breeding in dahlias.

sub_answers.marking_notes:
removal of leaves: reduction + surface area / stomata ; (1 mark)
covering with transparent bag: increase humidity ; (1 mark)
to reduce transpiration OR evaporation / water loss ; (1 mark)
